question: when did the first ninja turtles come out
vanilla_rag_result: The first "Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles" comic was self-published by Laird and Kevin Eastman in May 1984. The first series of Ninja Turtles action figures was released by Playmates Toys in the summer of 1988. Additionally, the "Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles" animated series began airing in the winter of 1987.
